items.title: Zomato grants 12 million stock options to eligible employees under ESOP plans
items.description: The total stock options granted amount to Rs 330.17 crore at Zomatoâ€™s current share price of Rs 275.2, which surged by 2.38 percent on October 2

items.title: Hindalco, JSW Steel in race for copper mines in Jharkhand
items.description: Hindalco Industries and JSW Steel will be vying for state-owned Hindustan Copper Ltd's two copper mines in Jharkhand, sources said
